_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Plutonium with python Logserver
author: dominique@wellisch-itservice.de
description:
Plutonium Client with python iw4m log server.
You need to add +set zombiemode 1 for t4 zombies to the start arguments
startup: (cd "${HOME}/Plutonium/" && wine64 bin/plutonium-bootstrapper-win32.exe "${GAMETYPE}${GAMEMODE}" "${HOME}" -dedicated +map_rotate +set key "${KEY}" +set net_port "${SERVER_PORT}" +exec "${CFG}") & python3 runserver.py

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
install_dir="/mnt/server"
cd $install_dir

cd /mnt/server
# Installing the server, if specified
if [ "${INSTALL_SERVER}" == 1 ]; then
    if [ "${GAMETYPE}" == "t4" ]; then
        wget --header='Host: drive.usercontent.google.com' --header='User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/122.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' --header='Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.7' --header='Accept-Language: de-DE,de;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7' --header='Cookie: HSID=AW3W31jCk3SirwgUG;         unzip iw5x.zip
    fi
fi

# Installing i4wm log server
if [ ${IW4M} == 1 ]
then
# Download the iw4m log server
cd /mnt/server
wget "https://github.com/RaidMax/IW4MAdmin-GameLogServer/releases/download/1.0.0/GameLogServer.zip"
unzip GameLogServer.zip
rm GameLogServer.zip
#Changes the IW4M Log Server Default Port 1625 to the Same as the server
sed -i "s/1625/${SERVER_PORT}/g" runserver.py 
fi

#Download default configs
#T6
if [ "${GAMETYPE}" == "t4" ]; then
        mkdir -p /mnt/server/main
        cd /mnt/server/main/
        wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xerxes-at/T4ServerConfigs/refs/heads/main/main/server.cfg"
        wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xerxes-at/T4ServerConfigs/refs/heads/main/main/server_coop.cfg"
        wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xerxes-at/T4ServerConfigs/refs/heads/main/main/server_zm.cfg"
    elif [ "${GAMETYPE}" == "t5" ]; then
        mkdir -p /mnt/server/Plutonium/storage/t5/
        cd /mnt/server/Plutonium/storage/t5/
        wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xerxes-at/T5ServerConfig/refs/heads/master/localappdata/Plutonium/storage/t5/dedicated.cfg"
        wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xerxes-at/T5ServerConfig/refs/heads/master/localappdata/Plutonium/storage/t5/dedicated_sp.cfg"
    elif [ "${GAMETYPE}" == "t6" ]; then
        mkdir -p /mnt/server/Plutonium/storage/t6/
        cd /mnt/server/Plutonium/storage/t6/
        wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xerxes-at/T6ServerConfigs/refs/heads/master/localappdata/Plutonium/storage/t6/dedicated.cfg"
        wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xerxes-at/T6ServerConfigs/refs/heads/master/localappdata/Plutonium/storage/t6/dedicated_zm.cfg"
    elif [ "${GAMETYPE}" == "iw5" ]; then
        mkdir -p /mnt/server/admin
        cd /mnt/server/admin
        wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xerxes-at/IW5ServerConfig/refs/heads/master/admin/server.cfg"
    fi

#Make sure everything is readable/runable for container user
chmod -R 755 /mnt/server*

#clean
rm -R /mnt/server/localappdata

variables.name: Game Mode
variables.description: The gamemode of the server, either zm (zombies) or mp (multiplayer) or sp (for t4 and t5)

variables.name: Server Key
variables.description: Your Server API Key, pasted from https://platform.plutonium.pw/serverkeys

variables.name: Config Name
variables.description: Name of the config file the server should use

variables.name: Game Type
variables.description: The codename for the game, e.g. t6

variables.name: IW4M Log Server - Enabled
variables.description: Installs a log server for IW4M Admin (on installation) and runs it on startup. This does not install IW4M Admin itself, run IW4M Admin on a separate container.

variables.name: Install Server Files
variables.description: This will install the server zone files. Only disable this if you have a read-only mount with the files already. It is highly recommended you use a mount to save a lot of storage space.
